alert.note: Alert for Dorado; Toa Baja; Vega Alta; Vega Baja (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued February 05 at 6:34PM AST until February 05 at 8:30PM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Vega Baja Municipality in Puerto Rico... Vega Alta Municipality in Puerto Rico... Dorado Municipality in Puerto Rico... Toa Baja Municipality in Puerto Rico... * Until 830 PM AST. * At 633 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated persistent heavy rain across the warned area. up to 6 inches of rain have fallen, and additional rainfall is expected over the next few hours. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Heavy rain producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Mudslides in areas of steep terrain. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Dorado; Toa Baja; Vega Alta; Vega Baja
